system.name: Flexible Preparations
system.effect:
Target: A Pok√©mon that has Contest Stats from Poffins
Effect: The target may reallocate up to 2d6 of Poffin-Derived Contest Stats from one Contest Stat to another. This effect lasts until the end of the day.
system.prerequisites: Adaptable Performance, Adept Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition
